items.title: Vibrant Atmosphere
items.text: The Tap Room provides the perfect environment to relax after a demanding day with its cozy dining sections and friendly bar. Among the top-rated bars in Edmonton, this one is well-known for its energetic yet friendly atmosphere.

items.title: Sports Central
items.text: Are you passionate about sports? On our huge displays, catch every game. One of the greatest sports bars in West Edmonton, we are the last stop for sports enthusiasts.

items.title: Community Hub
items.text: We take immense delight in becoming a neighbourhood favourite. Everyone feels comfortable at The Tap Room, whether your visit is frequent or first-time. Organise your next get-together at The Tap Rooms, your first choice for an Edmonton 101 pub and grill. Celebrate in style with our great cuisine, beverages, and ambience.
